description: Dim moonlight filters in from above, barely illuminating the area.  It is clear, however, that each wall of the cavern is spliced with thick veins of serpentine.  A thin coat of serpentine dust covers both the ground and the vines that hang down through the overhead crevice.  Lack of light makes further progress into the dark cavern impossible.
title: [Monsoon Jungle, Shallow Cavern]
